juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Facial features of the person from image 1
*   Body shape of the person from image 1
*   Pose of the person from image 1 (standing, hands on hips)
*   Dark ponytail hairstyle of the person from image 1
*   Striped knit top with blue collar and short sleeves from image 2 (as the upper garment)
*   Light-beige wide-leg pants from image 3 (as the lower garment)
*   Bare feet of the person
*   Plain light grey background from image 1
